room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: I had so much fun doing the rooms! It's the fastest hour of your life! The rooms are done so cleverly and will leave you talking about them for the weeks after!

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: My group was one of the 20% and survived the unfortunate situation!!! One of the best things I've done in a long time and the staff was amazing !!

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: It was a great experience. We had a blast. Got burn notice but were so close to solving it! Would definitely go back!

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: Our work team had a blast in the Stalked room. It was awesome and we escaped! Highly recommend this as a fun team building experience!

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: My wife, 4 friends and I had an absolute blast! Feels pretty intense and we finished with only 57 seconds left. Some very challenging puzzles. Would highly recommend to all ages.

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: 12 people was way too many in that chamber. There wasn't enough for everyone to do. Plus we got stuck with another group of 6 and working with strangers was super awkward. It would've been more fun with just my friend group. Not sure I'd go back. Fun to do once.

room_title: Escape room "The Assignment" by Escape Chambers in Milwaukee
review: We were lucky that there were only the 6 of us in the room. The room was designed to hold 10, but that would have been too many. The puzzles were interesting, but we did get stuck too long on some of them. We almost escaped. I would possibly go back and try another room there. My biggest complaint though is that we bought a Groupon and when we got there, we had to pay $10.08 in taxes. No where on our groupon does it state that. We had a Groupon for the escape room in Racine and didn't have to pay anything when we got there.
